Reception given in honour of Shanghai Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Cambodian preparatory committee formed to commemorate Sun's Day 
    Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was formed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, on March 20 to commemorate Sun's Day, President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary.
 Norodom Ranariddh, chairman of the Cambodian Funcinpec Party and President of the National Assembly of the Kingdom of Cambodia, was elected chairman of the committee.   
 The committee decided to organize multifarious events including meeting, film show, photo exhibition and friendly and cultural evening gala and widely introduce Kim Il Sung's immortal revolutionary exploits through publications on the occasion of Sun's Day.

articles.title: Chinese residents in Korea help builders of "Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse"
State commendations to builders of youth hero motorway
articles.content:
Chinese residents in Korea help builders of "Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse" 
    Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Chinese residents in South Hwanghae Province helped the builders of "Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse" in Haeju, its provincial capital.
 The chairman of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea and other Chinese residents visited the construction site, bringing with them aid materials. They encouraged the builders, working and singing together with them during break.
